benefits:
What Attendees Will Gain: -
  • Networking Opportunities: Connect with academics, industry leaders, and policymakers.
  • AI Insights: Gain valuable knowledge on AI-powered learning and education advancements.
  • Exclusive Benefits: Explore innovations in education and collaboration opportunities with universities and AI specialists.
Key Outcomes: -
  • Access cutting-edge curriculum recommendations and industry-aligned skills frameworks.
  • Develop a roadmap for research collaborations and knowledge-sharing with top experts.
audience:
Who Should Attend?
  • Academia & Industry Professionals: University leaders, curriculum designers, AI experts, and HR specialists.
  • Policymakers: Influencers in education and technology shaping the future of learning.
  • Aspiring Minds: Students and enthusiasts passionate about AI, data, and educational innovation.
Students are highly encouraged to join! This is a great opportunity to explore AI's role in education and connect with industry leaders.
desc: The AI 360 Advanced Powered Learning conference is a premier collaborative event dedicated to exploring the transformative role of artificial intelligence in higher education. Under the theme "Future Trends: AI in Higher Education", the conference delves into the dynamic intersection of academia and industry, fostering innovation and partnership. ~Key discussions will revolve around AI-powered learning in education, industry-academia collaboration, and cutting-edge AI applications in higher education. By bringing together leading experts, the event aims to define AI's evolving role in shaping future-ready curriculums and ensuring alignment with industry needs, paving the way for a more innovative and sustainable educational landscape.
